title: Docking Station Troubleshooting
description: Resolving issues with laptop docking stations, including display, USB, and charging failures.

steps.title: Power Cycle Dock
steps.instruction: Unplug the docking station from the laptop AND the power outlet. Wait 30 seconds. Plug power back into dock, then dock into laptop.

steps.title: Check Connections
steps.instruction: Ensure the USB-C cable is firmly connected to the correct port on your laptop (look for a thunderbolt or charging icon).

steps.title: Update Firmware/Drivers
steps.instruction: Run your manufacturer's update tool (e.g., Dell Command Update, Lenovo Vantage) to check for dock firmware updates.

steps.title: Test Without Dock
steps.instruction: Plug devices (monitor, mouse) directly into the laptop to confirm if the issue is the device or the dock.

steps.title: Ticket Preparation
steps.instruction: If the dock fails, raise a ticket with: Dock Model Number (from bottom sticker), Laptop Asset ID, and description of what isn't working (e.g., 'Monitors off', 'Not charging').
